method.name: scale
method.description: Scale position by scalar

method.name: toString
method.description: Returns string represantation for debugging

method.name: height
method.description: Returns maximum height

method.name: width
method.description: Returns maximum width

field.name: Ax
field.description: Ax as used in JS app

field.name: Ay
field.description: Ay as used in JS app

field.name: Bx
field.description: Bx as used in JS app

classRec.name: Model
classRec.description: App Model containing JSON data, state logic and common properties.
classRec.author: patrickwolleb

method.name: Model
method.description: Constructor Creates instances of Signals and get current Time.

method.name: parse
method.description: Parse changes the video file extensions to .f4v for use in Flash. This is due to the JSON data being shared between the JS and Flash apps.

method.name: setOverlayByID
method.description: Validates overlay ID. Dispatches overlayChanged signal on success or throws a OverlayID error

method.name: setShotByID
method.description: Validates shot ID. Dispatches shotChanged signal on success or throws a VideoID error

method.name: updateDeltaTime
method.description: Updates time and returns delta;

method.name: overlayChanged
method.description: OverlayChangedSignal containing Overlay object payload

method.name: previousShot
method.description: Previous shot Returns null when staring up

method.name: shotChanged
method.description: ShotChanedSignal containing Shot object payload

method.name: shot
method.description: Current active shot model

field.name: _currentOverlay
field.description: Refernce to current Overlay(lightbox) model object

field.name: _currentShot
field.description: Refernce to current Shot model object

field.name: _overlayChanged
field.description: Signal that is dispatched when overlayID has been validated successfully

field.name: _overlays
field.description: Array of overlays(lightboxes) as defined in JSON

field.name: _previousShot
field.description: Refernce to previous shot

field.name: _shotChanged
field.description: Signal that is dispatched when shotID has been validated successfully

field.name: _shots
field.description: Array of shots as defined in JSON

field.name: bandwidth
field.description: Bandwidth calculated from JSON data response time

field.name: time
field.description: Time since app start

classRec.name: HTTPService
classRec.description: HTTPService Encapsulates URLLoader providing signals for callbacks.
classRec.author: patrickwolleb

method.name: HTTPService
method.description: Constructor Creates instances and adds listeners

method.name: destroy
method.description: Removes references and listeners to get object ready for garbage collection

method.name: onComplete
method.description: Request success callback

method.name: onIOError
method.description: IO Error callback

method.name: onProgress
method.description: Progress callback

method.name: onSecurityError
method.description: Securtiy Error callback

method.name: send
method.description: Sends the request

method.name: bandwidth
method.description: Calculated bandwidth for last request

method.name: completed
method.description: SuccessSignal

method.name: progressed
method.description: ProgressedSignal

field.name: IP_HEADER_OVERHEAD
field.description: Bandwidth detection IP Packet is usually 576 bytes in size, including 40 bytes of header data: 40/576 = 0.69444 or ~7% --> 0.93 --> from http://www.betriebsraum.de/blog/2007/02/27/flash-video-tip-1-calculating-an-optimal-buffer-size/

field.name: _bandwidth
field.description: Calculated bandwidth for last request

field.name: _completed
field.description: CompletedSignal

field.name: _loader
field.description: URLLoader reference

field.name: _progressed
field.description: Progressed Signal

field.name: _request
field.description: URLRequest reference

field.name: _time
field.description: Time passed until response received

classRec.name: DistortImage
classRec.description: Tesselates an area into several triangles to allow free transform distortion on BitmapData objects.
classRec.author:
Thomas Pfeiffer (aka kiroukou)
kiroukou

Ruben Swieringa
ruben.swieringa
classRec.version:
1.1.0
edit 2
The original Actionscript2.0 version of the class was written by Thomas Pfeiffer (aka kiroukou),
inspired by Andre Michelle (andre-michelle.com).
Ruben Swieringa rewrote Thomas Pfeiffer's class in Actionscript3.0, making some minor changes/additions.
Copyright (c) 2005 Thomas PFEIFFER. All rights reserved.
Licensed under the CREATIVE COMMONS Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 2.0 you may not use this
file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at:
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/fr/deed.en_GB

method.name: DistortImage
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: w Width of the image to be processed
h Height of image to be processed

method.name: __init
method.description: Tesselates the area into triangles.

method.name: __render
method.description: Distorts the provided BitmapData and draws it onto the provided Graphics.

method.name: setPrecision
method.description: Sets the precision of this DistortImage instance and re-initializes the triangular grid.

method.name: setSize
method.description: Sets the size of this DistortImage instance and re-initializes the triangular grid.

method.name: setTransform
method.description: Distorts the provided BitmapData according to the provided Point instances and draws it onto the provided Graphics.
method.param: graphics Graphics on which to draw the distorted BitmapData
tl Point specifying the coordinates of the top-left corner of the distortion
tr Point specifying the coordinates of the top-right corner of the distortion
br Point specifying the coordinates of the bottom-right corner of the distortion
bl Point specifying the coordinates of the bottom-left corner of the distortion

method.name: hPrecision
method.description: Horizontal precision of this DistortImage instance. Property can only be set through the class constructor.

method.name: height
method.description: Height of this DistortImage instance. Property can only be set through the class constructor.

method.name: vPrecision
method.description: Vertical precision of this DistortImage instance. Property can only be set through the class constructor.

method.name: width
method.description: Width of this DistortImage instance. Property can only be set through the class constructor.

field.name: smoothing
field.description: Indicates whether or not use pixelsmoothing in the beginBitmapFill method of the Graphics class.

method.name: init
method.description: Initializes with stage for docking bottom left

method.name: log
method.description: Appends a string to text in the textarea

classRec.name: Button
classRec.description: Abstract Button Class Shoud be used within FLash IDE as base classes of library items
classRec.author: patrickwolleb

method.name: Button
method.description: Constructor

method.name: destroy
method.description: Removes references and listeners to get object ready for garbage collection

method.name: onMouseDown
method.description: MouseDown callback dispatches clicked signal containing button model payload.

method.name: onMouseOut
method.description: MouseOut callback method stub

method.name: onMouseOver
method.description: MouseOver callback method stub

method.name: clicked
method.description: ClickedSignal containing model as payload

method.name: model
method.description: Any Model usually target value object

field.name: _clicked
field.description: Button clicked signal

field.name: _model
field.description: Any Model usually target value object

classRec.name: MainPreloader
classRec.description: Preloader It is compiled into a SWF that is loaded from swfobject.js. This object loads the Main app and addsit to stage.
classRec.author: patrickwolleb

method.name: MainPreloader
method.description: Constructor creates Loader and LoaderAnimation instances.

method.name: onAddedToStage
method.description: AddedToStage is called when MainPreloader has been instanciated.

method.name: onLoadComplete
method.description: LoadComplete is called when Main.swf has been successfully loaded. It adds the Main app to stage and passes the LoaderAnimation reference.

method.name: render
method.description: Render is called when ENTER_FRAME event id fired. It updates the LoaderAnimation's progress and layout in case of stage resizing while loading.

field.name: _animation
field.description: Loader Animation AKA Prelaoder

field.name: _loader
field.description: Loader for Main.swf

classRec.name: Main
classRec.description: Appliaction entry point It reads bottom up for easy developement
classRec.author: patrickwolleb

method.name: Main
method.description: Contructor

method.name: loadData
method.description: LoadData is called when the StageVideoPlayer dispatches it's ready signal. It creates an instance of HTTPService to load to app JSON data.

method.name: onAddedToStage
method.description: AddedToStage is called when the app main view has been added to stage. In development mode this should happen righ after the constructor gets called. When the app is loaded by the MainPreloader the app waits until the ADDED_TO_STAGE event is fired.

method.name: onHotpsotClicked
method.description: HotpsotClicked callback is called when a Hotspot is receives a MOUSE_DOWN from the user. The callback is hooked up through a Signal containing the traget model.
method.param: hotspot Shot model object as defined in JSON. Note it's not strong-typed.

method.name: onOverlayChanged
method.description: ShotChanged callback is called when the Model validated the traget id as a new overlay and found the respective Overlay value Object
method.param: overlay Overlay model object as defined in JSON. Note it's not strong-typed.

method.name: onOverlayClosed
method.description: OverlayClosed callback is called when overlay close button received MOUSE_DOWN event. That event triggers a signal containing the current Overlay value object as a payload.
method.param: overlay Overlay model object as defined in JSON. Note it's not strong-typed.

method.name: onOverlayHidden
method.description: OverlayHidden callback is called when the overlay has been completely faded out and is ready to be removed from stage. This method is hooked up through a signal being dispatched from the Overaly view object.

method.name: onResize
method.description: Resize callback is called when stage RESIZE event is fired. It calculates the videoRectangle and the stageRectangle and then positions and resizes all UI elements. Note that stageRectangle's x and y are stage center positions

method.name: onShotChanged
method.description: ShotChanged callback is called when the Model validated the traget id as a new shot and found the respective Shot value Object.
method.param: shot Shot model object as defined in JSON. Note it's not strong-typed.

method.name: parseData
method.description: ParseData is called from the JSON data HTTPService passing itself and the server response.

method.name: render
method.description: Render callback is called when stage ENTER_FRAME event is fired.

method.name: start
method.description: Start is called when the app has loaded the JSON into the Model and the StageVideoPLayer is ready.

method.name: loaderAnimation
method.description: Set the LoaderAnimation if preloading the Main app. Set by MainPreloader.

field.name: _black
field.description: Black fullscreen shape for shot and overaly transisitons

field.name: _floorPlan
field.description: House blueprint top-left corner

field.name: _hotpsotRenderer
field.description: Container for hotspots

field.name: _loaderAnimation
field.description: Loader Animation AKA Prelaoder

field.name: _model
field.description: App Model

field.name: _overlay
field.description: Overlay(Lightbox) view

field.name: _pictureRenderer
field.description: Container for pictures mapped onto the video

field.name: _player
field.description: Main VideoPlayer object
